Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 990345 PQK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the New York City Charter, concerning the acquisition of real property located at 741 Flushing Avenue, Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 34, for use as a senior enter and a day care center.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.

Uniform land use review procedure application no. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
